      <tr>
        <td id="L7981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7981"></td>
        <td id="LC7981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that threatens to outrival Paris itself. The work of such men as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7982"></td>
        <td id="LC7982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Kroeyer, Zorn, Petersen, Liljefors, Thaulow, Bjoerck, Thegerstroem, is as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7983"></td>
        <td id="LC7983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">startling in its realism as it is brilliant in its color. The pictures</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7984"></td>
        <td id="LC7984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the Scandinavian section of the Paris Exposition of 1889 were a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7985"></td>
        <td id="LC7985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">revelation of new strength from the North, and this has been somewhat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7986"></td>
        <td id="LC7986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">increased by the Scandinavian pictures at the World&#39;s Fair in 1893. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7987"></td>
        <td id="LC7987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is impossible to predict what will be the outcome of this northern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7988"></td>
        <td id="LC7988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">art, nor what will be the result of the recent movement here in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7989"></td>
        <td id="LC7989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">America. All that can be said is that the tide seems to be setting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7990"></td>
        <td id="LC7990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">westward and northward, though Paris has been the centre of art for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7991"></td>
        <td id="LC7991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many years, and will doubtless continue to be the centre for many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7992"></td>
        <td id="LC7992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">years to come.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7993"></td>
        <td id="LC7993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7994"></td>
        <td id="LC7994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7995"></td>
        <td id="LC7995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC10112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">refund.  If you received the work electronically, the person or entity</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L10113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10113"></td>
        <td id="LC10113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">providing it to you may choose to give you a second opportunity to</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L10114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10114"></td>
        <td id="LC10114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">receive the work electronically in lieu of a refund.  If the second copy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10115"></td>
        <td id="LC10115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is also defective, you may demand a refund in writing without further</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10116"></td>
        <td id="LC10116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opportunities to fix the problem.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10200"></td>
        <td id="LC10200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">charities and charitable donations in all 50 states of the United</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10202"></td>
        <td id="LC10202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">considerable effort, much paperwork and many fees to meet and keep up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10203"></td>
        <td id="LC10203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with these requirements.  We do not solicit donations in locations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10204"></td>
        <td id="LC10204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where we have not received written confirmation of compliance.  To</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10205"></td>
        <td id="LC10205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">SEND DONATIONS or determine the status of compliance for any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10206"></td>
        <td id="LC10206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">particular state visit http://pglaf.org</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10207"></td>
        <td id="LC10207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10208"></td>
        <td id="LC10208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">While we cannot and do not solicit contributions from states where we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10209"></td>
        <td id="LC10209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have not met the solicitation requirements, we know of no prohibition</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10210"></td>
        <td id="LC10210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against accepting unsolicited donations from donors in such states who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10211"></td>
        <td id="LC10211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">approach us with offers to donate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10212"></td>
        <td id="LC10212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10213"></td>
        <td id="LC10213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">International donations are gratefully accepted, but we cannot make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10214"></td>
        <td id="LC10214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any statements concerning tax treatment of donations received from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10215"></td>
        <td id="LC10215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">outside the United States.  U.S. laws alone swamp our small staff.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10216"></td>
        <td id="LC10216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="L10217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10217"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L10223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10223"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L10226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10226"></td>
        <td id="LC10226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor Michael S. Hart is the originator of the Project Gutenberg-tm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10227"></td>
        <td id="LC10227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">concept of a library of electronic works that could be freely shared</td>
